item.title: Restore Clone Migrate - WordPress Tutorial - CodeTab
item.description: 11.3.Â WordPress Restore, Clone In the previous section, we saw how to offload the backup files to the Dropbox. In this section, we use the backup for a full WordPress restore and also to clone it to a new site and use it cloned site as testing or staging area. WordPress Restore WordPress Restore procedure involves following steps: Create a new WordPress application on OpenShift. Import MySQL dump to database.
